content: lion brand pattern # bk4k-0612011 skill level beginner level 1 child 11-12 adult medium large lion brand wool-ease thick & quick 106yrds/97m 6oz/170g 640-153 black - 1 ball note one ball will make 2 hats crochet hook size n-13 gauge 6 6 single_crochet and 8 row = 4 / 10cm *lion brand patterns are written in u s crochet terminology * *free registration at site required to access patterns *
